name: Rocket’s Raikou ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Lightning Burst
poke_power.effect: Whenever you attach a {D} Energy card from your hand to Rocket’s Raikou ex, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon and switch it with 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Benched Pokémon to switch. This power can’t be used if Rocket’s Raikou ex is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Thunderous Blow
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each {L} Energy attached to Rocket’s Raikou ex.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
